mapper.select: select * from Plan where user_id=#{user_id} and plan_start_time like '%${date}%'
mapper.insert: insert into Plan(user_id, plan_content, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, plan_if_repeat, plan_if_prompt, plan_if_prompt_time, plan_if_finish) values (#{user_id}, #{plan_content}, #{plan_start_time}, #{plan_end_time}, #{plan_if_repeat}, #{plan_if_prompt}, #{plan_if_prompt_time}, #{plan_if_finish})
